Dude, tells some instructions maybe ?
crack and that i understand but how to use that program in best way
so does this block my ip adress for torrents???

For documentation - thegreenbow.com/vpn_doc.html
www.opengear.com/docs/AppNote-GreenBow%20IPsec%20VPN.pdf

This is for the new release May 2011 - 5.03.002
Pay or 30 day trial.

This is a great free VPN. It works perfectly fine. What you should do, if you want to create an effective VPN, is rename the root name and the tunnel name to a combination of letters, numbers, capitals, and lowercase. 

For example: 

gsjk2313WG5th
--2rqjgWG5sgb

Use 256-bit AES encryption on both settings.

Make sure you use the subnet address option and also don't surpass DH2-1024, or your tunnel will likely not open.

Your IP / local connection will show up on other computers as a completely scrambled combination of letters and numbers, like "fbfdj8132jfjvek35"

Enjoy and keep seeding.
